resources.string: Tap the \"Chirp!\" button each time you hear a cricket chirp. After enough taps, the estimated temperature will be displayed.
Check to enable sharing of logged cricket chirp data (for science!). No personally identifiable data is shared.

Would you like to enable sharing of logged cricket chirp data with the developer of this application? No personally identifiable information will be shared. The data will be used for scientific research and to improve the accuracy of the cricket chirps to temperature conversion. This option can be changed later in the options menu.
Interval between chirps too long! Resetting…
